title: Escape from the Forbidden Planet
description: Caramel Cinnamon thought the worst day of her life was the day her grandparent’s the King and Queen of the Elves of Cardamom went missing.  She was wrong!  The day she spills sticky toffee syrup onto her father’s computer, that's when her worst nightmare begins. She finds herself marooned on a forbidden planet, sent there by an evil clone with a very sticky secret.  Caramel is desperate to escape. If she doesn't she will lose her dreams of returning to Cardamom to become a healer like her Mum.  Luckily, she has a secret of her own and the lives of her family and friends depend on it!
author: Julie Anne Grasso
